title: Croatia Producer Prices Change
description: Producer Prices in Croatia increased 17.90 percent in October of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Producer Prices Change in Croatia averaged 2.39 percent from 2009 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 24 percent in June of 2022 and a record low of -6.60 percent in May of 2020. In Croatia, the Producer Price Index measures the average change in price of goods and services sold by manufacturers and producers in the wholesale market during a given period. This page provides - Croatia Producer Prices Change- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Croatian Bureau of Statistics
